name: Core API Release 36.8.0
description: We have released a new version of the Core APIs, featuring several new additions. Please see below for details.

ADDED.text: Several new APIs have been incorporated into our new feature, Passkey, an authentication method.
New error codes 1315, 1316, and 1317 have been introduced as part of our Breached Password Protection feature, designed to safeguard user accounts from potential compromises.
